thread.title: Mulayam Singh expels Ramgopal Yadav for six years, again
thread.title_full: Mulayam Singh expels Ramgopal Yadav for six years, again

title: Mulayam Singh expels Ramgopal Yadav for six years, again

organizations.name: indian express online media pvt ltd best

text:
Mulayam Singh expels Ramgopal Yadav for six years, again Mulayam Singh expels Ramgopal Yadav for six years, again Acting against Ramgopal for convening a national executive meet, Mulayam expelled him from Samajwadi Party for six years. By: Express Web Desk | New Delhi | Published:January 1, 2017 2:29 pm Acting against Ramgopal for convening a national executive meet, Mulayam expelled him from Samajwadi Party for six years. 
Samajwadi Party supremo Mulayam Singh Yadav on Sunday once again cracked the whip against Ramgopal Yadav just days after expelling him from the party along with his son Akhilesh Kumar Yadav for six years. Acting against Ramgopal for convening a national executive meet, Mulayam expelled him from Samajwadi Party for six years. At the meeting today, the party’s national executive elected Akhilesh Yadav as the new party chief. Mulayam rejected the move and called it “unconstitutional”. He called for a fresh meeting on January 5. © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd Best of Express
